comment: Mr. Jordan is a great professor. While he does assign lots of homework and sometimes gives pop quizzes, he is extremely good at explaining and clarifying material. He doesn't take attendance, but I would recommend you come regularly or you will be completely lost. Overall excellent professor.

I enjoyed professor Jordan's class. It was my second time at this and I felt much more prepared going into the final this semester. He teaches and expects you to know / remember things. He doesn't spoon feed like the other math instructors I've had. I would seriously recommend him as an instructor.

Didn't seem like I struggled nearly as much as friends I had taking different instructors. He does expect you to pay attention, he doesn't always write down steps that he considers to be covered in previous class. But he will always stop and answer questions during class. If you can set up an office appointment with you he is helpful there also.

He is a great teacher, as long as you go to class. I missed 1 week (2 classes) and emailed him about it and he refused to answer my emails. He takes a while to grade tests and doesn't actually put any grades into D2L so if he doesn't hand back a test you have no idea what your grade is. He does give easy points on tests though.

He does go into great detail about what to do, but the homework can be a bit difficult and isn't always covered in class. Thankfully his tests aren't too terribly difficult. Go to class or get notes from someone else.
Good teacher. The tests are more difficult than the stuff you do in class. Study for them and make sure you really understand material. The homework helps alot!

GREAT! He is extremely helpful and genuinely cares about his students. I have him for ChemLab @ChattTech. He goes above & beyond, but the work is hard...it's Chem, but he makes it fun. I highly reccomend him!
Great teacher, very helpful. He will work with you but he won't do it for you. He is willing to meet you halfway if you put forth effort. One of the best math teachers I have ever had.
